text:
When you try to start Tomcat with te "-security" option, the "tomcat.sh" script 
don't take off the "-security" label before calls Tomcat, so you receive 
the "Usage:" message and Tomcat doesn't start. There is a "shift" missing in 
the tomcat.sh script. I just verify the bug when you call tomcat 
whith "/.startup.sh -security" so the real command is "/.tomcat.sh start -
security", and you have to verify the options "run -security", "xxx -xxxxxx" 
etc.
creator: dnielben@bahiavirtual.com

text: The bug is fixed in 3.3 and 3.2.2
creator: cmanolache@yahoo.com
